spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The anarch's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the anarch is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anarch makes three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Strike
entries: The anarch makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The anarch magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

legendary.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The anarch casts the {@spell reverse gravity} spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the anarch can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.
